name: FormSync
desc: A full-stack form management platform for user registration, API key generation, and form submissions, featuring a secure dashboard for tracking and management with JWT authentication.

name: Login & Register System (Desktop App)
desc: A Java (AWT/Swing) desktop application for user registration and login, featuring a graphical interface and secure user authentication with a MySQL database via JDBC.

name: Library Management API
desc: A RESTful backend system built with Spring Boot to manage library books, users, and borrowing records, implementing full CRUD operations and relational data mappings.

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
desc: An interactive, browser-based two-player Tic Tac Toe game featuring dynamic UI updates, game logic, and win/draw detection, built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
